PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_ValueName: Name of the field that is beeing changed.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_ValueOperato: Operator for the change. Will be loaded using the templates.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_ValueIsNumbe: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the field which is getting updated is a number field. Must be closed using Tale_Action_ValueIsNumber_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the field which is getting updated is a number field.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_ValueIsStrin: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the field which is getting updated is a string field. Must be closed using Tale_Action_ValueIsString_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the field which is getting updated is a string field.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_OperatorIsSe: Start of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is "Assign To". Must be closed using Tale_Action_OperatorIsSetTo_End.
End of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is "Assign To".
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_OperatorIsNo: Start of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is not "Assign To". Must be closed using Tale_Action_OperatorIsNotSetTo_End.
End of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is not "Assign To".
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_OperatorIsAd: Start of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is "Add". Must be closed using Tale_Action_OperatorIsAdd_End.
End of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is "Add".
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_OperatorIsNo: Start of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is not "Add". Must be closed using Tale_Action_OperatorIsNotAdd_End.
End of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is not "Add".
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_OperatorIsSu: Start of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is "Substract". Must be closed using Tale_Action_OperatorIsSubstract_End.
End of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is "Substract".
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_OperatorIsNo: Start of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is not "Substract". Must be closed using Tale_Action_OperatorIsNotSubstract_End.
End of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is not "Substract".
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_OperatorIsMu: Start of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is "Multiply". Must be closed using Tale_Action_OperatorIsMultiply_End.
End of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is "Multiply".
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_OperatorIsNo: Start of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is not "Multiply". Must be closed using Tale_Action_OperatorIsNotMultiply_End.
End of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is not "Multiply".
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_OperatorIsDi: Start of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is "Divide". Must be closed using Tale_Action_OperatorIsDivide_End.
End of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is "Divide".
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_OperatorIsNo: Start of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is not "Divide". Must be closed using Tale_Action_OperatorIsNotDivide_End.
End of the content that is only rendered if the current operator is not "Divide".
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_ValueName_Eq: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the name of the field that is updated equals a certain value. 'NAME_OF_FIELD' must be replaced with the name to check. The comparison is case-insensitive. Must be closed using Tale_Action_ValueName_Equals_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the name equals a certain value.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Action_ValueName_No: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the name of the field that is updated not equals a certain value. 'NAME_OF_FIELD' must be replaced with the name to check. The comparison is case-insensitive. Must be closed using Tale_Action_ValueName_NotEquals_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the name not equals a certain value.
